# ping

 
Ping a workspace


## Usage
```console
ping <workspace>
```


## Options
### --verbose, -v
 
| | |
| --- | --- |

Enables verbose logging.
### --wait
 
| | |
| --- | --- |

Specifies how long to wait between pings.
### --timeout, -t
 
| | |
| --- | --- |
| Default |     <code>5s</code> |



Specifies how long to wait for a ping to complete.
### --num, -n
 
| | |
| --- | --- |
| Default |     <code>10</code> |



Specifies the number of pings to perform.
